norman.meetingHighlights: University-area meetings tied to the University of Oklahoma and steady neighborhood groups.
norman.transitInfo: CART and campus transit services; proximity to Will Rogers World Airport in Oklahoma City.

oklahoma-city.neighborhoods: Bricktown, Midtown, Automobile Alley, Uptown, Stockyards, Paseo Arts District
oklahoma-city.meetingHighlights: Extensive urban meeting schedule with many specialty, speaker, and Big Book study groups across neighborhoods.
oklahoma-city.transitInfo: Embark public transit serves the city; Will Rogers World Airport (OKC) provides national flights.

tulsa.neighborhoods: Downtown, Brookside, Cherry Street, Utica Square, South Tulsa, Midtown
tulsa.meetingHighlights: Large metro fellowship with numerous neighborhood meetings, speaker nights, and active newcomer programs.
tulsa.transitInfo: Tulsa Transit buses and regional connections; Tulsa International Airport (TUL) serves regional and some national flights.

broken-arrow.neighborhoods: Downtown, Rose District, South Broken Arrow
broken-arrow.meetingHighlights: Suburban meetings with family-friendly schedules and several evening groups.
broken-arrow.transitInfo: Regional transit links to Tulsa and nearby highways; commuter routes serve the suburbs.

lawton.meetingHighlights: Community meetings with evening and weekend groups; some military-connected meetings near Fort Sill.
lawton.transitInfo: Lawton Area Transit services and proximity to regional highways and airports.
